favorites.descriptions.no-entries: You don't have any favorites yet. Start pinning your entries and you'll see them here.
home.descriptions.no-entries: There are no entries registered for this day. Your journal awaits, start by creating a new entry.
home.titles.no-favorites: You don't have any favorites yet.
locked-state.title: Entries are protected.
locked-state.description: The entry protection system is enabled. Click the button below to unlock, or access the security menu and remove protection.
login.subtitle: Stored forever, truly yours.
login.title: More than just a journal, your memory.
modals.delete-entry.title: Delete this entry?
modals.delete-entry.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.
modals.logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?
modals.logout.descriptions: This action will disconnect your current wallet. Your user name and email will not be removed.
modals.reset.title: Reset all entries?
modals.reset.descriptions: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all local entries from this device? Entries saved on the Blockchain cannot be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
new-entry.descriptions.images-ipfs: Images saved with IPFS cannot be deleted and are publicly available.
profile.descriptions.therapy-share: We will use this for therapy sharing.
profile.inputs.name: User name
search-results.descriptions.no-entries: We couldn't find any entries registered. Make sure you applied the correct filters to match your entries.
settings.backup.save.title: Save Backup
settings.backup.save.description: A backup file with your entries will be exported. Keep it in a safe place.
settings.backup.save.error: An error occurred while exporting file
settings.backup.retrieve.title: Retrieve Backup
settings.backup.retrieve.description: Sync your entries via your backup. You can merge current entries with recovered ones, or start from scratch.
settings.backup.retrieve.alert.ipfs: Images removed from the device and not saved with IPFS will not be displayed.
settings.backup.retrieve.alert.merge: All current entries will be lost!
settings.backup.retrieve.error: An error occurred while retrieving the file
settings.lock.description: Keep your entries secure from curious eyes. We will use your device's authentication method.
